title: Impeachment… it happened, Peter Thiel’s influence at Facebook, and prediction: “FedEx gets acquired"
summary:
Kara and Scott talk about what impeachment might mean for business. Also they talk about Peter Thiel's influence behind the scenes at Facebook and their political ad policies. Meanwhile, SoftBank is on an on-going disaster. A personal win for Kara is Amazon banning third-party sellers from using FedEx (after her recent tweet-storm). Which brings Scott to predict that FedEx will get acquired in the next couple of years.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
